00030 class NvFaceInfo {
00031 public:
00032         
00033         // vertex indices
00034         NvFaceInfo( int v0, int v1, int v2, bool bIsFake = false ){
00035                 m_v0 = v0; m_v1 = v1; m_v2 = v2;
00036                 m_stripId      = -1;
00037                 m_testStripId  = -1;
00038                 m_experimentId = -1;
00039                 m_bIsFake = bIsFake;
00040         }
00041         
00042         // data members are left public
00043         int   m_v0, m_v1, m_v2;
00044         int   m_stripId;      // real strip Id
00045         int   m_testStripId;  // strip Id in an experiment
00046         int   m_experimentId; // in what experiment was it given an experiment Id?
00047         bool  m_bIsFake;      //if true, will be deleted when the strip it's in is deleted
00048 };
00049 
00050 // nice and dumb edge class that points knows its
00051 // indices, the two faces, and the next edge using
00052 // the lesser of the indices
00053 class NvEdgeInfo {
00054 public:
00055         
00056         // constructor puts 1 ref on us
00057         NvEdgeInfo ( int v0, int v1 ){
00058                 m_v0       = v0;
00059                 m_v1       = v1;
00060                 m_face0    = NULL;
00061                 m_face1    = NULL;
00062                 m_nextV0   = NULL;
00063                 m_nextV1   = NULL;
00064                 
00065                 // we will appear in 2 lists.  this is a good
00066                 // way to make sure we delete it the second time
00067                 // we hit it in the edge infos
00068                 m_refCount = 2;    
00069                 
00070         }
00071         
00072         // ref and unref
00073         void Unref () { if ( --m_refCount == 0 ) delete this; }
00074         
00075         // data members are left public
00076         UINT         m_refCount;
00077         NvFaceInfo  *m_face0, *m_face1;
00078         int          m_v0, m_v1;
00079         NvEdgeInfo  *m_nextV0, *m_nextV1;
00080 };

00083 // This class is a quick summary of parameters used
00084 // to begin a triangle strip.  Some operations may
00085 // want to create lists of such items, so they were
00086 // pulled out into a class
00087 class NvStripStartInfo {
00088 public:
00089         NvStripStartInfo( NvFaceInfo *startFace, NvEdgeInfo *startEdge, bool toV1 ){
00090                 m_startFace    = startFace;
00091                 m_startEdge    = startEdge;
00092                 m_toV1         = toV1;
00093         }
00094         NvFaceInfo    *m_startFace;
00095         NvEdgeInfo    *m_startEdge;
00096         bool           m_toV1;      
00097 };

00110 template<class T> 
00111 inline void SWAP( T& first, T& second ) 
00112 {
00113         T temp = first;
00114         first = second;
00115         second = temp;
00116 }

00118 // This is a summary of a strip that has been built
00119 class NvStripInfo {
00120 public:
00121         
00122         // A little information about the creation of the triangle strips
00123         NvStripInfo( const NvStripStartInfo &startInfo, int stripId, int experimentId = -1 ) :
00124           m_startInfo( startInfo )
00125         {
00126                 m_stripId      = stripId;
00127                 m_experimentId = experimentId;
00128                 visited = false;
00129                 m_numDegenerates = 0;
00130         }
00131 
00132         // This is an experiment if the experiment id is >= 0
00133         inline bool IsExperiment () const { return m_experimentId >= 0; }
00134           
00135         inline bool IsInStrip ( const NvFaceInfo *faceInfo ) const 
00136         {
00137                 if( faceInfo == NULL )
00138                         return false;
00139                   
00140                 return ( m_experimentId >= 0 ? faceInfo->m_testStripId == m_stripId : faceInfo->m_stripId == m_stripId );
00141         }
00142           
00143         bool SharesEdge( const NvFaceInfo* faceInfo, NvEdgeInfoVec &edgeInfos );
00144           
00145         // take the given forward and backward strips and combine them together
00146         void Combine( const NvFaceInfoVec &forward, const NvFaceInfoVec &backward );
00147           
00148         //returns true if the face is "unique", i.e. has a vertex which doesn't exist in the faceVec
00149         bool Unique( NvFaceInfoVec& faceVec, NvFaceInfo* face );
00150           
00151         // mark the triangle as taken by this strip
00152         bool IsMarked    ( NvFaceInfo *faceInfo );
00153         void MarkTriangle( NvFaceInfo *faceInfo );
00154           
00155         // build the strip
00156         void Build( NvEdgeInfoVec &edgeInfos, NvFaceInfoVec &faceInfos );
00157           
00158         // public data members
00159         NvStripStartInfo m_startInfo;
00160         NvFaceInfoVec    m_faces;
00161         int              m_stripId;
00162         int              m_experimentId;
00163           
00164         bool visited;
00165 
00166         int m_numDegenerates;
00167 };
